tasks.title: Add Role-Based Filtering to AppLayout
tasks.description: Import useHasRole hook and add conditional rendering to menu items based on user role
instructions: 1. Read current AppLayout.tsx file
2. Import useHasRole and RoleGroups at top
3. Add role checks using useHasRole hook for each menu item
4. Add Team, Settings, Super Admin menu items (ADMIN+)
5. Wrap menu items with role checks - use && operator
6. Verify imports and syntax with Read tool

codeChanges.imports:
import { useHasRole } from '@/lib/hooks/useHasRole';
import { RoleGroups, UserRole } from '@/lib/constants/roles';
codeChanges.newImports: import { Settings } from 'lucide-react'; // Add Settings icon if not imported

verificationSteps: 4. Verify hook calls: canManageHR, canViewAnalytics, isAdmin, isSuperAdmin
6. Count menu items wrapped in role checks

tasks.reportTemplate:
# Phase 4 - Sidebar Navigation Verification

Date: [CURRENT_DATE]
Executor: [YOUR_NAME]

## 1. useHasRole Hook Import Check

```bash
$ grep -n "useHasRole" frontend/components/AppLayout.tsx
```

**Output:**
```
[PASTE_EXACT_OUTPUT_HERE]
```

**Expected:** Import line + hook calls (canManageHR, canViewAnalytics, isAdmin, isSuperAdmin)

---

## 2. RoleGroups Import Check

```bash
$ grep -n "RoleGroups" frontend/components/AppLayout.tsx
```

**Output:**
```
[PASTE_EXACT_OUTPUT_HERE]
```

**Expected:** Import statement with RoleGroups

---

## 3. Conditional Rendering Check (canManageHR)

```bash
$ grep -n "canManageHR &&" frontend/components/AppLayout.tsx
```

**Output:**
```
[PASTE_EXACT_OUTPUT_HERE]
```

**Expected:** Multiple lines with canManageHR && conditions

---

## 4. Admin-Only Menu Items

```bash
$ grep -n "isAdmin &&" frontend/components/AppLayout.tsx
```

**Output:**
```
[PASTE_EXACT_OUTPUT_HERE]
```

**Expected:** Conditional rendering for Team and Settings

---

## 5. Super Admin Menu Item

```bash
$ grep -n "isSuperAdmin &&" frontend/components/AppLayout.tsx
```

**Output:**
```
[PASTE_EXACT_OUTPUT_HERE]
```

**Expected:** Conditional rendering for Super Admin menu

---

## 6. Team Menu Item

```bash
$ grep -n "/team" frontend/components/AppLayout.tsx
```

**Output:**
```
[PASTE_EXACT_OUTPUT_HERE]
```

**Expected:** Link to /team page

---

## 7. Settings Menu Item

```bash
$ grep -n "/settings" frontend/components/AppLayout.tsx
```

**Output:**
```
[PASTE_EXACT_OUTPUT_HERE]
```

**Expected:** Link to /settings/organization page

---

## 8. TypeScript Compilation Check

```bash
$ cd frontend && npm run build 2>&1 | head -50
```

**Output:**
```
[PASTE_EXACT_OUTPUT_HERE]
```

**Expected:** Successful build or specific errors listed

---

## Summary

**useHasRole imported:** [YES/NO from section 1]
**RoleGroups imported:** [YES/NO from section 2]
**canManageHR checks:** [COUNT from section 3]
**isAdmin checks:** [COUNT from section 4]
**isSuperAdmin checks:** [COUNT from section 5]
**Team menu added:** [YES/NO from section 6]
**Settings menu added:** [YES/NO from section 7]
**TypeScript errors:** [YES/NO from section 8]

**Status:** [COMPLETE/INCOMPLETE] - Review raw data above to verify

---

**Note to Reviewer:** This report contains RAW terminal output. Review each section to verify:
- Section 1: Should show import + 4 hook calls
- Section 2: Should show RoleGroups import
- Section 3: Should show multiple canManageHR && lines
- Section 4: Should show isAdmin && lines (Team, Settings)
- Section 5: Should show isSuperAdmin && line (Super Admin menu)
- Section 6: Should show /team path in Link
- Section 7: Should show /settings path in Link
- Section 8: Should show successful build

instructions: âš ï¸ ASANMOD STRICT MODE - HUMAN TESTING REQUIRED âš ï¸
